storyInfo: Through four critical junctures in her time with the Glasgow Gang, Dagda comes to realize the true purpose her fellows had in seeing her off, even if it meant them perishing in battle: To forget her position as tombkeeper of this waning empire, and rediscover her life.

attributes.content: Hey? M... Madam Dagda?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You still want us to keep calling you that, right...? I'm here to apologize for the scrap yesterday. Hannah's too embarrassed to come herself, but she did help pick out these clothes and all.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Um, that whole malarkey yesterday, that's just how the Glasgow Gang does nice-to-meet-yous. If we're not all in agreement, then we let fists do the talking first. I've not got anything against you in actuality, love!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: So, want to give these clothes a peep?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Madam Morgan, but I don't think I should be here or be party to these. It's not in accordance with etiquette.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: The principal source of any friction with me was Madam Indra. There's no need for any apologies from you.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: And these clothes are hardly suitable given my current standing and circumstances. I won't be wearing them, and I won't be forsaking my rescue of Her Royal Highness.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Wait, pause it with the 'etiquette' and the 'standing' and whatever. You're just going to turn these down, out of hand?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Madam Morgan, I really apologize, but I shouldn't...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: One sec!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Look, we're giving you this to say sorry! It's a whole outfit, all brand-new! The least you could do is look first before you decide!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: This... I...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Ahem! Madam Morgan... it's the duty of we Knights of the Tower that we support Her Royal Highness in Her accession to the throne. My mentor has consistently impressed the matter of the vacant throne on me, that it rests barren.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: It's a mission and a responsibility I take incredibly seriously, and I'm very thankful for your help these past few days, but...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Oh, stuff this and stuff you and STUFF YER MOUTH! You like it, I can tell! So put it ON!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Guh!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: It's not right for a Knight of the Tower to—
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Wait, just one moment...!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: —Well!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Ha-ha-HA! Now that looks bang-up on you.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Well, thank you. Now that I've tried on your gift, I think I should change back into my original clothing.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Let me root around... Got a trimmer here! I can do up your eyebrows one sec.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Wait, I don't—
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Stop blinking! I'm just trimming your brows, love, calm down! I've got my studs here too, if you want me to pierce you up? I'm telling you, earrings would go smashing with this outfit!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Once we're all done here, you'll be a member of the Glasgow Gang just like us!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: FINE! If you hate it, then I'll bloody take it off for you!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Vina gave me half an earful yesterday and I'll admit she talked some real sense, but if you're dead set against us, then let's go for round two! Let our fists do the talking!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Eyy-up—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Flip's sakes, what now?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I'm keeping it on!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Thank you, Madam Morgan. I do love this outfit, and these earrings.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Also... could you help fix up my brows for me...? I'll try not to blink.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Wait, so you accept Indra's apology?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I knew it! You were never narked at us really!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Hannah's just loud-mouthed and cocky in spades. If you went serious one-on-one, she'd never beat you.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: 'Scuse me?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Dagda... Madam Dagda, that is, you might want to slow down too. You just arrived and all—Vina's still thinking it over herself.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: And I mean, Hannah too. You spouted all that 'protect the honor of Victoria' guff at her and you could see the dynamite go off inside her, but she doesn't hold it against you. She'd just rather kick any noble in the gonads, that's all.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Hmph!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Madam Morgan, I feel we can refrain from keeping our distance. You can simply call me Dagda.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: And Hannah? Can she call you that too?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: She... can, I... suppose.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Here, you can have these earrings now.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Looking good, right fit! You were made for this style! Shame Vina's not a patch on you.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: She's dressed like the arse-end of Bottom Alley right now. How about sometime we give her a makeover like yours?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Ah... If it would be for Her Highness...!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Adhering by your counsel, I have found Her Royal Highness Alexandrina. However, it shocked me to find that she did not wish to leave her present companions, to travel with me.
Your teachings are still writ in my head. It was every one of you that broke the capture and delivered me out... (The text is struck through.)
(Fresh handwriting follows.)
Her Highness's present companions are a cohort of gang members, with Her as their leader.
Madams Indra and Morgan have given me new uniform, the latter of whom also gifted me her earrings. They say that from today forth, I may consider myself too a member of the Glasgow Gang.
I'm reminded of the time Master Bailey first taught me makeup, as well as her taking me to see the fashion show in secret. I had all but forgotten those memories.

Yet I have not forgotten the vacant throne I am entrusted with, being that I cannot let the Knights fall in further disgrace. I know I can never accomplish this alone no matter what, but this purpose has brought me to this day, and is what I exist for.
I will see our liege back, and Victoria's throne will be vacant no more.
Bloody Morgan had me on! I just knew it, I could see her dying to laugh when she agreed! Stunk of evil, that!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I don't think I should be teaching a class right now, though. I wanted to prepare a little before we return, plus I never hang around the Training Room in the first place...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Gonna do Vina's work, then? Talk with the Doctor about heading back to Londinium?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: What talks are they even having? We're heading back, full stop. As a Knight of the Tower, don't you think I should be elsewhere...?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Cork it! You're here, with me, so let's try these lot on for size! Now no more chatter!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: ...Indra?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: (Jackie, is Instructor Indra always this testy?)
attributes.name: Intern Operator

attributes.content: (I think some stuff happened in Victoria...)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Gah! Whatever, you bloody lot don't know how long the story is. Here's the deal! We're going, so today's the last chance you get to fight us!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Our little girl here can explain the rest to you. I... am DONE talking now!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Ahem. Er... I'll be your opponent for today.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Right. You can call me Dagda.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I'm not too sure what you've been doing before, so we'll go through some daily exercises for today. I'd like all to follow along properly, if you'd please.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Now then... let's begin.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Based on my experiences being trained, you'll first want a grasp on your swimming, lancing and fencing skills, as well as learning how to wipe off your weapons, and fight in coordination.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Er, I'll demonstrate them to you one by one now... no, wait. You don't need to be studying this...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I'm imagining—you're here to learn how to engage in practical combat.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Indra, can you help me one second? I want us to demonstrate for them how I used to spar in training.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You're on!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: This is your first training session, Isabelle Montague. Before you formally begin training as a Knight of the Tower, I want you to always keep this in mind—
attributes.name: Finn

attributes.content: Victoria's throne will not be vacant forever.
attributes.name: Finn

attributes.content: Yes, Master!
attributes.name: Isabella

attributes.content: ...My mother instructed me that we nobles should be the pride of Victoria.
attributes.name: Isabella

attributes.content: But more than that pride, it's duty I hope to succeed. Though the Palace stands empty, the honor I protect is all the same! Disgrace will never fall on our name again!
attributes.name: Isabella

attributes.content: Now watch and bloody learn!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hngh—!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: (Abdomen, face, both exposed points...)
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: (I'll focus on them...)
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Isabelle Montague—
attributes.name: Finn

attributes.content: Dark be the lights of the Palace. It falls to me, upon this hour, to anoint thee as a Knight of the Tower.
attributes.name: Finn

attributes.content: Yes, Master!
attributes.name: Isabella

attributes.content: You have wiped clean your weapon. Do you swear here and now, that you will uphold the peace?
attributes.name: Finn

attributes.content: I swear.
attributes.name: Isabella

attributes.content: Do you swear here and now, that you will relinquish your personal greed, that you will inherit the spirit and honor of the Knights of the Tower, that you will pledge fealty to the Kingdom?
attributes.name: Finn

attributes.content: I swear.
attributes.name: Isabella

attributes.content: Do you swear here and now, that you will devote the remainder of your life to protecting Victoria, to protecting this nation?
attributes.name: Finn

attributes.content: I swear!
attributes.name: Isabella

attributes.content: Your oath is made.
attributes.name: Finn

attributes.content: Isabelle Montague, no longer are you apprentice under the Tower. You are now a Knight of the Tower, in all trueness and formality.
attributes.name: Finn

attributes.content: Whoa! That one was crazy!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Wow, she almost sent Instructor Indra flying... Is Instructor Dagda just this powerful?
attributes.name: Intern Operator

attributes.content: (This won't do. Master Finn taught me that modesty was a knight's virtue...)
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: (I'm here to assist. Knocking Indra away is far from right.)
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: (And she'd buy a ceiling lamp and end with a bath heater if she just gets angry enough...)
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Oi, oi, now I've got you wide open!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: My turn!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hahaha! How LONG'S it been since I went like this? This is the STUFF!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Give your hand here, I'll pull you up!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Wow... You can tell Instructor Indra's got real-deal talent, though! What a turnaround!
attributes.name: Intern Operator

attributes.content: I know, right! Why else would I recommend her to you?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, I heard that! So you lot were doubting me just now?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Erk!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: No, no, we weren't! You Glasgow Gang people are all incredible examples!
attributes.name: Intern Operator

attributes.content: You're calling us... 'examples'?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Of course I am! Everyone knows how amazingly strong each of you are, and I hear you're a knight too... a 'Tower Knight', was that right?
attributes.name: Intern Operator

attributes.content: Not to mention Instructor Indra! Joining up with a street gang's always been a childhood fantasy of mine!
attributes.name: Intern Operator

attributes.content: I can imagine the look on my dad's face...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I seriously can't thank you two enough, I've taken so many notes! Instructor Indra, I'll be even more powered up by the time you're back again!
attributes.name: Intern Operator

attributes.content: ...Pff.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: What are you gigglin' for? About time someone sings my bloody praises, right?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Yeah, you are right tough!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: So, let's get back to it?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Master Finn,
As mentioned in my previous memorandum, I boarded a landship by the name of Rhodes Island, together with Siege. Today we depart it, and return to Londinium.
Indra asked I hold her final class together with her, and bid farewell to her sparring partners. It was a deliberate move of her so that I'd shake some of my nerves, I know.
I taught them how the Knights fight. I never imagined anyone would care what combat lessons a 'Knight of the Tower' had to teach.
They all know Victoria has its Steam Knights, those tremendous heroes that soar through the air, rumble-ye-rumble. People seem more keen to believe their stories.

But these operators, sparring for practice? The name of 'Tower Knights' is familiar to them too, and their notes hold our combat characteristics as you first taught me. All while they're not even Victorians.
I seem to understand why Indra loves boxing with them so much now.
I apologize, Master.

It's been so long that I'm bound to forget some of what you first taught me. But I still remember how you entrusted me with the matter of the vacant throne, though I can't remember the words in concrete any longer.
Found ya, you sneaky bastard! That should be our last drop of the good stuff!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: A shot for each! Here's to us, together once again!
attributes.name: Indra
Dagda
attributes.content: We need a better celebration than this—

attributes.name: Dagda
attributes.content: Bleaagh! What IS this?
My giddy aunt, why've we still got this blanket?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: It's been hard getting new supplies in these past few years. It's still usable if you care.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I'm supposing Hannah still doesn't admit she caused the gashes in it?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wasn't me! Like I'd even bleeding remember!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Shh, keep it down! We'll have another scene if that little arsehole out there hears you!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: What, scared he can take me? Back when we moved this gym sofa in, he was still in nappies!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hannah, calm down. I can go talk to him. Too many people we've been unable to save in recent times, that's all, it's getting to him...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Who gives a shit about him, let's drink! C'mere, don't just stand around like an idiot! Haven't introduced you yet, even—here, this is Baird, here, this is Dagda!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: How do you do, Madam Baird. I've heard plenty about you before. They say you do very pretty work with butterfly knives, and you make good drinks too.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Here we go again... bleeding 'Madam'...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Er, I suppose...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Shame I can't make you lot anything right now. Too low on goods, and everything we've scavenged is filthy.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: That is a shame... Indra's eyes light up every time she recalls it. I've always wanted to...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Okay, okay! Nice to meet each other, ain't it? You're not getting her drinks, nah? So let's just down this stuff!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I'll fetch you a glass, Dagda. How much can you take?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Just a little'll be fine. I don't really want to get drunk.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Baird, how tough's your liver these days? Used to be we could each drink half a crate by ourselves, remember!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I'll take just a little too. I don't really drink much as of late.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Baird, want to take a walk with me?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'd like to see what this place has become. I've been away so long.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: ...Sure.
attributes.name: Baird
Indra
attributes.content: You could drink first and then go—

attributes.name: Indra
attributes.content: Agh! Bloody hell are you hittin' me for?
Let them go!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Dagda, you want a little something to drink?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: In a bit, maybe. How about after the two of them come back? Madam Baird doesn't look in the best of moods.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We haven't met for too long, is the thing. With how much's happened here...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I fancy we just need more time to chew the fat, but... that's not time we've got right now.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Forget all that nonsense! Once Baird's back, you watch me give her a right proper hug!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I've heard no end about your boxing gym. Now I'm finally seeing it... I remember the huge row I had with you all back at first. And still, after that, you gave me these clothes of mine.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Since that day, I've reckoned you to be a bunch of... pretty alright people. Just a bit tempersome.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Repeat that?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: And it's been a long time, since I've... celebrated, with a group of people like this.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Is this how you and your Masters used to do dos? Drinking and all? Or was it karaoke? Maybe a little dance?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Well, drinking was a little...! I suppose they did have to tell me to loosen up all the time, but... we did mainly sing to celebrate.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: What kinda stuff?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Oooh! Alright, ahem... Isa, you're in charge of this get-together from hereon. Lead us all in celebration!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Haha, good impression, right?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: We're back. What have you been talking about?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We've...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Dagda remembers the final night she sang with her colleagues in merriment.
Her Masters nudged her to allow some air between her and the Knights' creeds, and they shed their armor, and led her on down to a cramped little basement bar.

They squeezed together on the seats and held each other shoulder by shoulder, so as not to be seen, and sang to the murky ceiling at the top of their voices, singing until the patrons all about them cursed at them for the noise—
By wild and a-yonder, by rage and a-galewards ♪
Red-ripper moons and the blackest of broadswords ♪
Death hangs above in the air and does eye me ♪
Here in the tower, Victoria be me ♪
Death hangs above in the air and does eye me ♪
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Here in the tower, Victoria be me ♪
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Death hangs above in the air and does eye me ♪
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Death hangs above in the air and does eye me ♪
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: *hic*!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: ...Baird?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You don't have to come out if you don't feel like it, I just wanted to chat with you. Things like, um. 'Siege and the gang mention you a lot, so even though this is the first we've met, I feel like I already know you pretty well.'
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: And, um... 'You speak about things a little differently to how they do, and I'd like to get to know you a little more.'
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: *cough*... Okay! I admit, Morgan pushed me to see you, I don't actually... really know what to say. I'm sorry, Madam Baird.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: ...Pfft.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Sorry, I guess my mood's been spoiling it for you lot.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: You say that... The first time I met them, we ended up in a huge scrap. Indra was in splints for weeks after. I think that would've spoiled their moods more, right?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Oh, never knew about that... What did you say to set all that off?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Well, that I was a Knight of the Tower. And I'd sworn to succeed to the honor and the shame of Victoria, and I'd be leaving with Siege, so we could return to have her installed as monarch as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: That was the sticking point. Even on the way here, Indra hasn't stopped arguing with me about that.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: How about you lot? Did you tend to argue at first?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Mm... we'd get Hannah to clean the room for once, and she'd just stuff away everything she didn't recognize into one tiny cupboard...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Eugh, I just knew she'd do something like that...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Or... let me think. Hannah might've accidentally sprayed Vina in the face with fizzy pop one time? I remember they had a MASSIVE scuffle about that.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Morgan was pissed afterwards. Went up to me and asked, 'how come I go in to mediate and they sock ME?'
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Hahaha, that's the first I've heard of anything like that...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: What about you, then? Did you ever have rows with them?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Never. I've... never fought with them before.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: In that case, I think maybe you could try having a quarrel? Er, not that I know anything, but...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: After we first fought, Morgan gave me this outfit, and these earrings, and I was let into the Glasgow Gang. Indra started getting dead upset at all my 'knightly habits' after that, so I changed bit by bit...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: In my mind, I'm a Knight of the Tower, one to Her Majesty, King of the Siege, but at the same time, we're Glasgow Gangers too. Just friends. Don't you think?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Ugh, Morgan couldn't give me a trickier mission... How am I supposed to be the comforting sort?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: ...Pfft.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I know what you're trying to get at. We just... me and them have been apart for too long.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: What's to fear? Honestly, I bet Indra reckons everything's as usual as it could be. You're still just the same in her eyes.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: That much I believe. That much, I do.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: So, may as well scrap with her first! Right?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: ...Suppose so.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Feeling better now? Wow, I'm not even sure what I'm saying anymore... See you tomorrow, then?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Right on. See you tomorrow!
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Tomorrow... We've still got plenty that needs doing. It's down to us to distribute all the meds and supplies those people with you brought...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Baird pats her on the shoulders, cracks a faint little smile, and quietly hums through the tune Dagda sang when she first came back with the gang.
It stirs a memory in Dagda, of years and years ago. As if Master Finn had clapped her just as firmly on the shoulders, that final time they belted out their song.
Or perhaps, it was that encirclement, the last breakthrough, when his great bloodied hand gripped her shoulder as tightly as death.
'Isa! You... You brought us hope!'
'But you have to remember, the vacant throne...'
It's as if all this time an arrow has remained in flight, and here and now pierces true through her heart. At long last, she recalls the words that follow.
'It rests barren! Your duty is far more than to await a monarch!'
The throne has been a barren one...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: That's what he meant by 'vacant throne' all along...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: His old and weary smiles. His each and every turn to her gaze. His final breaths. His lone dying request. He hoped to push her, to free her from this gravest burden.
Dagda places her hand across the 'Book of the Tower Knights' forever on her person. A sturdy tome, a weighty one.
She continues to write no longer. In its stead, she forges one step forward, and that is all.
Siege, I... I've got some water. Have a drink.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: The Duke of Windermere's got supplies enough on this ship. You can drink what you'd like. No need to save any.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: It's fine. I'm much better now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: How are you? And the others who boarded with us, are they...?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The soldiers lost their fellow men, and we've...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Dagda strokes lightly across her brows. Where originally they were neatly kept, new hairs are now growing out, a slight stubble against her fingers.
I can't quite remember properly. Why did Baird split up with us, back then?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: ...Because one more time, she just wanted to get word to McClaren.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: She wanted everyone to come with. That's why she stayed behind. To fetch the bloke she knew from the video shop.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Her memory was never even that good.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I remember you all talking about how she got all careless once and let a basket of eggs slip. No breakfast for any of you the next morning.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: But she remembered how I stamp my feet about when I'm nervous. No one else even noticed, but she came over to me. Comforted me.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Why's her memory so good one moment and so bad the next...?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: ...I should have gone with her...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Maybe I should've persuaded her just a little harder. I knew how she'd stayed there all this time. I knew she'd care for the people more than we could know...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But we did nothing. You did nothing.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Siege, how much longer will you keep hesitating? When are you finally going to think to make a choice?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You have to choose!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: What IS your path in the end? Are you here as revenge for your friends, to be a king, to be a leader, or is it to see your moral code through? You can't just stay the way you are, not doing anything!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You put a decision to me on the way here. You said you weren't the lord I was born to serve. Well, I've made my decision.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: May the Knight die as vassal to her king. May the Knight die for her friends.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: The Knight will abide by virtue, and the Knight will gladly sacrifice. That is my oath.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: But, Dagda... It doesn't feel to me like they need an Aslan King anymore. All of that's in the past.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'll stand with you, with them, and with the people aboard this ship. That's all.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Siege, this Book of the Tower Knights is yours now. You must keep it safe and sound. That's my choice.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: What are you...?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I've realized what Master Finn was trying to tell me, and what it meant for them to stake their lives in order to rescue me.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: They didn't want for me to inherit their burden. They entrusted a 'vacant throne' to me, so I wouldn't deceive myself with the weight of it all like they did... They wanted me to see Victoria's future in their place, with clear eyes.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I give this book to you. No longer am I just Isabelle Montague, Knight of the Tower. Now more than ever, I'm Dagda of the Glasgow Gang.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I'm not protecting Victoria's king, no. I'm just protecting my friend.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The wind flies past their faces, endlessly for the yonder behind them, as if it blows everything away.
Once the war's over, I'll take you to visit the tower. Visit my masters.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Siege...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Never since I swore my oath have the lights in the Palace been lit, out behind the Tower. I've never guarded a Victorian monarch. We Knights of the Tower... long lost everything we ever protected.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: So I have to ask. Have the Knights of the Tower accomplished their duty...?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your duty is accomplished.
attributes.name: Siege
